# Developer Guide

Welcome to the Applied QM Documentation Generator developer guide. This documentation covers the SOLID-compliant modular architecture of the documentation generator.

## Quick Start

```bash
# Run generation
node scripts/index.js

# With custom source folder
node scripts/index.js -s ./my-files -r

# Watch mode
node scripts/index.js --watch

# Clean generated files
node scripts/index.js --clean
```

## Architecture Overview

The generator follows **SOLID principles** with a modular design:

```
scripts/
â”œâ”€â”€ index.js              # CLI entry point
â”œâ”€â”€ app.js                # Dependency injection container
â”œâ”€â”€ config/               # Configuration management
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ index.js         # Config factory
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ fileTypes.js     # File type definitions
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ chapters.js      # Chapter name mappings
â”œâ”€â”€ utils/                # Utility functions
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ fileSystem.js    # File I/O abstraction
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ logger.js        # Logging interface
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ helpers.js       # General helpers
â”œâ”€â”€ parsers/              # File parsing
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ programParser.js # Filename parser
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ fileClassifier.js# File type classifier
â”œâ”€â”€ generators/           # MDX generators
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ BaseGenerator.js # Abstract base class
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ MatlabGenerator.js
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ LatexGenerator.js
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ PdfGenerator.js
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ HtmlGenerator.js
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ NotebookGenerator.js
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ TextGenerator.js
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ IndexGenerator.js
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ SidebarGenerator.js
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ GeneratorFactory.js
â””â”€â”€ services/             # Business logic
    â”œâ”€â”€ DocumentProcessor.js
    â”œâ”€â”€ CleanService.js
    â””â”€â”€ WatchService.js
```

## SOLID Principles Applied

| Principle | Implementation |
|-----------|----------------|
| **Single Responsibility** | Each module has one job |
| **Open/Closed** | Add new generators without modifying existing code |
| **Liskov Substitution** | All generators extend BaseGenerator |
| **Interface Segregation** | Small, focused interfaces |
| **Dependency Inversion** | Services depend on abstractions |

## Module Categories

### Configuration (`config/`)
- **`index.js`** - Configuration factory with CLI support
- **`fileTypes.js`** - File type metadata (extensions, colors, emojis)
- **`chapters.js`** - Chapter number to name mappings

### Utilities (`utils/`)
- **`fileSystem.js`** - File I/O operations abstraction
- **`logger.js`** - Centralized logging with formatting
- **`helpers.js`** - General utility functions

### Parsers (`parsers/`)
- **`programParser.js`** - Extract program info from filenames
- **`fileClassifier.js`** - Classify files by extension

### Generators (`generators/`)
- **`BaseGenerator.js`** - Abstract base class with common methods
- **Type Generators** - One per file type (MATLAB, LaTeX, PDF, etc.)
- **`IndexGenerator.js`** - Program entry page generator
- **`SidebarGenerator.js`** - Docusaurus sidebar config
- **`GeneratorFactory.js`** - Factory pattern for generators

### Services (`services/`)
- **`DocumentProcessor.js`** - Main orchestration service
- **`CleanService.js`** - Cleanup operations
- **`WatchService.js`** - File watching for auto-regeneration

## Extending the Generator

### Adding a New File Type

1. **Add type config** in `config/fileTypes.js`:
```javascript
'.xyz': {
  type: 'xyz',
  label: 'XYZ File',
  emoji: 'ðŸ“Ž',
  color: '#123456',
  canReadText: true,
  codeLanguage: 'xyz',
}
```

2. **Create generator** in `generators/XyzGenerator.js`:
```javascript
const BaseGenerator = require('./BaseGenerator');

class XyzGenerator extends BaseGenerator {
  getType() { return 'xyz'; }

  generate(programInfo, fileData) {
    // Generate MDX content
  }
}

module.exports = XyzGenerator;
```

3. **Register in factory** (`GeneratorFactory.js`):
```javascript
const XyzGenerator = require('./XyzGenerator');
// Add to initializeGenerators()
```

## Data Flow

```
INBOX Files
    â†“
ProgramParser (extract metadata)
    â†“
FileClassifier (determine type)
    â†“
GeneratorFactory (get appropriate generator)
    â†“
Generator.generate() (create MDX)
    â†“
FileSystem.writeFile() (save)
    â†“
SidebarGenerator (update sidebar)
```
